testcase.name: NXGF-TC-2889: TC_000_View allocated payments_Verify that the user is able to navigate to cash allocation screen

NXGF-TC-2904: TC_015_View allocated payments_Verify that the user is able to search the previoulsy allocated payments with Policy reference
NXGF-TC-2906: TC_017_View allocated payments_Verify that the user clicks on the Reset button
NXGF-TC-2907: TC_018_View allocated payments_Verify that all the search fields are cleared
